io.sarl.maven.compiler

Class MavenHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.maven.compiler.MavenHelper

  • public class MavenHelper
extends Object
    This class permits to support the incompatible Maven API from the same Mojo code (says 3.0 and 3.1 APIs).
    Version:
    sarl-maven-plugin 0.12.0 20210527-171007
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl.maven
    Maven Artifact Id:
    sarl-maven-plugin
